players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Charlie: "I think we should vote Bob today. His silence is suspicious, and with only four of us, we can't afford inaction. Diana, who are you voting for?"
Diana: "I'm leaning towards voting Bob. His silence is suspicious, and Charlie makes a good point about needing to act. We can't afford to waste a day with no vote."

You: "I'd like to clarify my actions last night. I was in shock after discovering Alice's death and didn't want to make any hasty decisions. I believe we should focus on finding the real mafia among us instead of making false accus..."
